DOC.brief_summary: The study is designed to evaluate the safety and efficacy of paroxetine on the long-term use in Japanese Social Anxiety Disorder (SAD) subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Special Drug Use Investigation for PAXIL (Paroxetine) Social Anxiety Disorder (Long-term)
DOC.criteria: Subjects who are diagnosed as having SAD Subjects who are expected to use paroxetine tablets for the first time Subjects taking pimozide Subjects taking monoamine oxidase (MAO) inhibitor or within two weeks after discontinuation of MAO inhibitor Subjects with hypersensitivity to paroxetine
